name: locomotive production | locomotive | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3166/documentation

The dataset represents the production of a locomotive used for rail transportation with a life span assumed to be 40 years. The disposal of the locomotive is included as well.

Service starts with the material consumption and expenditure for the production of the locomotive.

The dataset ends with the production and disposal of one locomotive. The dataset includes material consumption, transport, energy and fuel consumption and disposal.
category: C:Manufacturing/30:Manufacture of other transport equipment/302:Manufacture of railway locomotives and rolling stock/3020:Manufacture of railway locomotives and rolling stock

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The energy data represents conditions in 2001. For some materials data from 1993 has been employed.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Manufacturing data represents a locomotive produced in Germany;.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The environmental interventions of the locomotive manufacturing are derived from an assessment of the “RE 460”. The “Re 460” is a locomotive which currently is used for both rail and passenger transportation in Switzerland. The life span of the locomotive “Re 460” is assumed to be 40 years resulting in a lifetime performance of 9.6 Mio. Kilometres Frischknecht et al. (1996). Expenditures due to vehicle manufacturing are limited to energy consumption (electricity and light fuel oil, including administration).;References:;Frischknecht R., Bollens U., Bosshart S., Ciot M., Ciseri L., Doka G., Dones R., Gantner U. and Hischier R. (1996) Ökoinventare von Energiesystemen: Grundlagen für den ökologischen Vergleich von Energiesystemen und den Einbezug von Energiesystemen in Ökobilanzen für die Schweiz. Auflage No. 3. Gruppe Energie - Stoffe - Umwelt (ESU), Eidgenössische Technische Hochschule Zuerich und Sektion Ganzheitliche Systemanalysen, Paul Scherrer Institut, Villigen, Bundesamt für Energie (Hrsg.), Bern
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Data for one locomotive in operation in Switzerland is used as an estimate for Europe
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: The data of the material composition and energy consumption is based on oral communication with an expert of one company.
